entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries this evening and ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
